documentation:
# Link Inline Basic

## Overview

A simple inline link renderer that displays URLs as clickable links with icons. Auto-registers with ContentRenderer when imported.

## Features

- Auto-registration with ContentRenderer (priority 1)
- Icon support using registry icons (no external dependencies)
- Handles both single URLs and arrays of grouped URLs
- Opens links in new tab with proper security attributes
